name: Claw
description: Installer for the DVD version of the game (it should also work with the CD version). This will also patch the game to version 1.3.0.
notes:
- A MIDI device or synthesizer (e.g. Qsynth) is required for in-game music playback
- CD-quality movies will be played instead of the DVD ones
content:
files:
- patch: http://kapitanpazur.piasta.pl/dl/claw13.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/games/claw/CLAW.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: DATA/CLAW.REZ
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Claw...
    executable: $DISC/SETUP.EXE
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Patching Claw...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/games/claw/
    src: patch
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting registry keys...
    key: Disable DVD Movies
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Monolith Productions\Claw\1.0
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: 1
